para.b: One of the main classes of the library.

summary.para: This engine is responsible to Read/Write the records One by One from/to files or streams.

remarks.para: You can set the of this class to find out when there is an error. Retrieve them with the property.
See in the Class Diagram and in the Quick Start Guide for more Info.
Or you can browse the Examples Section for more code.

FileHelperAsyncEngineCtr.summary: Initializes a new instance of the FileHelperAsyncEngine class with the specified type of records.
FileHelperAsyncEngineCtr.param: Type of object to be handled.

FileHelperAsyncEngineCtrG.summary: Initializes a new instance of the FileHelperAsyncEngine class with the specified type of records.

LastRecord.summary: Contains the last Record read by the method.

BeginReadFile.summary: Open a specified file and seek to the first record.

remarks.para: This method only opens the file.
To read record by record use the method.
When you stop reading the file you must call method.

BeginReadFile.param: The file path to be read.
BeginReadFile.returns: True if the file is successfully opened. False otherwise

BeginReadStream.summary: Open a specified stream and seek to the first record.

remarks.para: This method only seeks to the first record.
To read record by record use method.
When you stop reading the file you must call method.

ReadNext.summary: Reads the next record of a file.

remarks.para: This method returns the current record and moves to the next.
If the end of file is reached this method return null.

ReadNext.returns: The current record of the opened file.

ReadNexts.summary: Reads the specified number of records from a file or stream opened before.
ReadNexts.remarks: If there are less records than requested in the source, the file will be read to the end.
ReadNexts.param: The number of records to read. If there are less records than requested in the source, the file will be read to the end.
ReadNexts.returns: The next records of the opened file or stream.

Close.summary: Close all opened stream readers and writers (if any).

remarks.para: This method must be called when you finish processing a file to dispose of the opened streams.

BeginAppendToFile.summary: Open a file to Append to the end.

remarks.para: This method open and seek ends the file.
When you finish appending to the file you must call method.

BeginAppendToFile.param: The file path to be opened to write at the end.

BeginWriteFile.summary: Open a file to write it. If the file exists the engine will over write it

remarks.para: When you finish writing to the file you must call the method.

BeginWriteFile.param: The file path to be opened for write.

BeginWriteStream.summary: Set the stream to be used in the operation.

remarks.para: When you finished writing to the file you must call the method.

WriteNext.summary: Write the next record to a file or stream opened.

WriteNexts.summary: Write the next records to a file or stream opened.
WriteNexts.param: The records to write (Can be an array, List, etc)
